name: Slime Bomb Knight
description: A PSYCHOLOGICAL HORROR ATARI GAME BY DANGERDECKMAN! Oh no! The evil red monsters from below have captured princess Penelope! The only man that can save her is the brave Sir Dekota Slime and his good friend the blue wizard. Think you have what it takes to survive the HORRORS that await? A horror platformer designed to look and sound like an old Atari game. Characters, sounds, and music made by Danger Deckman.
